U

under - Variable in class com.mygdx.game.controller.ElementBody
 
update(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.controller.GameController
Updates all the entities of game, makes a step on the world, updates the velocities of the hero and it's direction, updates the state of the hero and the positions in the world of every body in it.
update(HeroBody) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.model.BatModel
Calls the update of the superclass and check if it necessary to put the flag that confirms if it will be necessary to flip the sprite, according to the bat and hero coordinates.
update(HeroBody) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.model.EnemyModel
Calls the method act of the behaviour of the enemy, saving its result in a array.
update(float) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.model.HeroModel
If the hero is invincible, decreases the time of invincibility.
update(HeroBody) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.model.SnailModel
Calls the method of the behaviour to get the velocity of the next movement and, if the y coordinate of the result the behaviour gives is less than 0, it switches the direction of the snail and gives that coordinate the value 0.
update(ElementModel) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.BatView
Updates the sprite with the facing of it and checks if the bat is still sleeping.
update(Object) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.BulletBarView
Gets the texture correspondent to the number of bullets still in the hero's possession and shows it.
update(ElementModel) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.ElementView
Centers the dimensions of the sprite with the position of the element in the world.
update(Object) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.HealthBarView
Depending on the health points of the hero, it sets as image the appropriate texture.
update(ElementModel) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.HeroView
Sets the state according to the action of the hero.
update(ElementModel) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.SnailView
Centers the sprite in the position of the model and checks if a flip will be needed according to it's direction.
update(Object) - Method in class com.mygdx.game.view.StatusElementsView
Abstract method, it updates the img according to information of the game.
